Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly enhance your experience and productivity. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it's worth more than its face value to you. Considering the exceptional value it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $75 for you today. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a fantastic discount. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your routine! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
